headings.usage: Page titles, section headers, widget titles

code.usage: DSL editor, console output, technical references

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: tight for headers, relaxed for body

colors.theme_strategy: Hybrid (Light Mode Base + Dark Mode Editor)

gradients.forbidden: No full-screen gradients. No dark gradients.
gradients.allowed: Subtle mesh gradients in light mode for hero sections only.

spacing.rules: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

containers.card_style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200), no shadow or very subtle shadow-sm. Sharp or slightly rounded corners (rounded-md).

specifics.buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded. Primary: Solid Navy. Secondary: Outline Slate.
specifics.cards: Go cardless where possible. Use whitespace dividers.
specifics.tables: Dense, high contrast headers. Zebra striping optional but preferred for finance data.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dark editor backgrounds.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky headers/overlays. High saturation blur.

images.description: Abstract geometric finance background for login or empty states

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, gradients).
Use depth through z-index and layered elements.
NO text-align: center on the main App container.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Ensure WCAG AA contrast ratios (4.5:1 for normal text).
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using a sidebar layout. The central area is the DSL Editor (Monaco Editor or similar text area styled as code). The right panel is the AI Assistant. Use the 'Manrope' font for headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body. Default to Light Mode for the app shell, but make the Code Editor component Dark Mode by default for contrast.
